translations: 似皮革的，皮质的；坚韧如皮革的

sentences.sentence: "Flamingos have evolved very leathery skin on their legs so they can tolerate the salt water," says David Harper, a professor at the University of Leicester.
sentences.translation: 莱斯特大学教授戴维·哈珀表示：“火烈鸟的腿上已经进化出了非常坚韧的皮肤，这样它们就可以忍受盐水。”

sentences.sentence: Her skin was leathery, her hands rough.
sentences.translation: 皮肤跟皮革似的，手也很粗糙。

sentences.sentence: Floating inside was a leathery ball-shaped object.
sentences.translation: 里面漂浮着一个皮球样皮质物体。
